meta.title: Use and Maintenance of Polypropylene Animal Cage

sections.purpose: To provide durable, easy-to-clean housing for small laboratory animals.
sections.scope: Applicable to routine housing of rodents in the Pharmacology animal facility.
procedure: Inspect cages for cracks or damage before use.
Line the cage with appropriate bedding material.
Provide food pellets and water bottles as per animal requirements.
House animals according to species, sex, and group allocation.
Clean and disinfect cages on a scheduled basis or when soiled.
Rinse thoroughly and dry cages before re-use.
precautions: Do not stack cages in a way that hinders ventilation.
Avoid using harsh chemicals that may degrade polypropylene.
Prevent overcrowding beyond recommended animal numbers.
Ensure secure fitting of cage lids and water bottles.
Follow CPCSEA or institutional animal ethics guidelines for housing.
